message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value for us both. After careful consideration, I propose a transaction where you could purchase this exceptional item at a price of $1200000. This offer is tailored to provide you with substantial benefits while ensuring a fair return for us. I believe this price reflects the true worth and potential of the product, making it an attractive proposition for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial agreement.
